attr.title: Pok√©wilds
attr.desc: Pokewilds is an open-world Pokemon fan game with survival and exploration elements. Built on Gen 2-style graphics, it features procedurally generated worlds, base-building, and freeform gameplay. Catch, train, and battle Pokemon while exploring diverse biomes, crafting shelters, and uncovering hidden secrets.
attr.inst: After installing the port, download the Windows game from https://github.com/SheerSt/pokewilds/releases and extract the `mods` and `app` folders, as well as `settings.txt`, into `ports/pokewilds/bin`.
